tasks.task: Wear extra protection when mixing and loading pesticides.
subtasks: Use an apron over protective equipment.

tasks.task: Carefully open pesticide containers to prevent dust from disbursing.
subtasks: Choose a low, flat surface for container placement.
Use a sharp knife or scissors, then clean them with soap and water before reuse for pesticide containers only.

tasks.task: Measure and pour pesticides correctly following label instructions.
subtasks: Pour liquids slowly and carefully to avoid splashes.
Position face and eyes well above the pesticide container during pouring.
